## Validate.isValidConditionToken() function

Determines whether a string is a valid [condition token](./ts-res.conditiontoken.md)<!-- -->. A condition token has the format: `<qualifierName>=<value>` or `<value>`

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isValidConditionToken(token: string): token is ConditionToken;
```

</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

token is [ConditionToken](./ts-res.conditiontoken.md)

`true` if the string is a valid condition token, `false` otherwise.
